alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 15 at 1:05PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Reno NV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in California... West Walker River Near Little Walker and Coleville affecting Mono County. .Warm temperatures will melt high mountain snowpack and increase river flows. For the West Walker Above Topaz Lake...including Little Walker and Coleville...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Walker River Near Little Walker and Coleville. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Moderate flooding of lowlands, pastures and some rural roads from the West Walker River Canyon to Topaz Lake including Walker Coleville and Topaz California. Slightly above the peak from May 2023, and slightly below the peak of June 2017. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:30 PM PDT Thursday the stage was 5.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage, peaking each night into Moderate stage with a maximum value of 6.7 feet early Sunday morning. - Moderate flood stage is 6.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.7 feet on 06/24/2011. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when near riverbanks. Even 6 inches of fast-moving flood water can knock you off your feet and a depth of 2 feet will float your car. Never try to walk, swim, or drive through such swift water. If you come upon flood waters, stop, turn around and go another way. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday.
